name: XDA Portal - 2015 - Dark Theme
description:
Simply copied the forum theme "2015 - Dark Theme" to the portal.
For some reason the themes one choose for the forum, does not apply to the portal.
additional_info:
Updates:
  2015-03-07: XDA-TV Content has been included in the theme.
  2015-03-06: Minor "Themer" logotype fix for firefox and other web browsers.
  2015-03-05: Updated accordingly to new layout.
